attributes.action: Stop using the passive voice when the active will do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call upon yourself and all Cabinet members to cease the careless, ill-informed and dangerous use of the passive voice when you intend to use the active. Phrases such as "I was sat" to mean " I was sitting" and other faux-pas of that kidney get my goat, and doubtless that of many others who have an iota of a scintilla of a morcel of a gram of a shred of respect for the great English language.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
